tasks.instructions: You should spend about 40 minutes on this task
tasks.topic: Some people think that zoos are all cruel and should be closed down. Others however believe that zoos can be useful in protecting wild animals. Discuss both opinions and give your own opinion.
requirements: Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience.
